data.actual_result: At least on Dark theme, the text is displayed in white over a blue and white Discord logo, making it barely visible
data.expected_result: The server icon displayed at the top of the Server Settings screen will show the icon text representing the server name drawn on a proper background color
data.short_description: If you open Server Settings in a server with the default icon, the text of the icon will be drawn over the default Discord logo, making it barely visible on Dark theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server - Go to Server Settings
